text: Cathryn Antoinette "Toni" Tennille (born May 8, 1940) is an American singer- songwriter and keyboardist. She is best known as one-half of the 1970s duo Captain & Tennille with her former husband Daryl Dragon. Her best known song is "Love Will Keep Us Together". ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:American pianists Category:American singer- songwriters Category:Singers from Montgomery, Alabama Category:Writers from Montgomery, Alabama Category:Musicians from Montgomery, Alabama
title: Toni Tennille
